headline.main: Don't End Agricultural Subsidies, Fix Them

docs.abstract: There's nothing wrong with agricultural subsidies, but plenty wrong with how they're used.
docs.lead_paragraph: Agricultural subsidies have helped bring us high-fructose corn syrup, factory farming, fast food, a two-soda-a-day habit and its accompanying obesity, the near-demise of family farms, monoculture and a host of other ills.
docs.snippet: There's nothing wrong with agricultural subsidies, but plenty wrong with how they're used.

headline.seo: Richard Daines, 60, Ex-New York State Health Chief, Dies
headline.print_headline: Richard F. Daines, 60, Ex-State Health Chief
headline.main: Dr. Richard F. Daines, Former State Health Chief, Dies at 60

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Daines was known for taking politically risky positions on public health policies like promoting a ban on using food stamps to buy soda.
docs.snippet: Dr. Daines was known for taking politically risky positions on public health policies like promoting a ban on using food stamps to buy soda.
